Module swan.g09.cs230a2
Package swan.g09.cs230a2

Class GameManager

java.lang.Object
swan.g09.cs230a2.GameManager
public class GameManager extends Object
The GameManager class is responsible for managing communications between tiles on each layer.

    Enum for handling the different ways the player can die.

    • loadLevel

      public static void loadLevel(String path, Integer lvlNumber, boolean lastLevel) throws InputMismatchException, IOException
      Loads a level from a given path.
      Parameters:
      path - the level path.
      lvlNumber - the level number in load order, null if unordered
      lastLevel - whether the level is last in the load order.
      Throws:
      InputMismatchException - If the level is the incorrect format.
      IOException - If the level is being read from resources, and it can't be accessed.

    • loadFromAutosave

      public static void loadFromAutosave(String path) throws InputMismatchException
      Load a level from an Auto save.
      Parameters:
      path - The path to the level file,
      Throws:
      InputMismatchException - If the level format was wrong (should never occur).

    • loadNextLevel

      Parameters:
      usedExtraLife - true if this restart was due to using an extra life
